com.bit6.sdk.util

Class ScalingUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bit6.sdk.util.ScalingUtilities

  • public class ScalingUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing static utility methods for bitmap decoding and scaling

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ScalingUtilities.ScalingLogic
      ScalingLogic defines how scaling should be carried out if source and destination image has different aspect ratio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScalingUtilities()

    • Method Detail

      • decodeResource

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeResource(android.content.res.Resources res,
                                     int resId,
                                     int dstWidth,
                                     int dstHeight,
                                     ScalingUtilities.ScalingLogic scalingLogic)
        Utility function for decoding an image resource. The decoded bitmap will be optimized for further scaling to the requested destination dimensions and scaling logic.
        Parameters:
        res - The resources object containing the image data
        resId - The resource id of the image data
        dstWidth - Width of destination area
        dstHeight - Height of destination area
        scalingLogic - Logic to use to avoid image stretching
        Returns:
        Decoded bitmap

      • decodeFile

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeFile(java.lang.String path,
                                 int dstWidth,
                                 int dstHeight,
                                 ScalingUtilities.ScalingLogic scalingLogic)

      • createScaledBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createScaledBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap unscaledBitmap,
                                         int dstWidth,
                                         int dstHeight,
                                         ScalingUtilities.ScalingLogic scalingLogic)
        Utility function for creating a scaled version of an existing bitmap
        Parameters:
        unscaledBitmap - Bitmap to scale
        dstWidth - Wanted width of destination bitmap
        dstHeight - Wanted height of destination bitmap
        scalingLogic - Logic to use to avoid image stretching
        Returns:
        New scaled bitmap object

      • calculateSampleSize

        public static int calculateSampleSize(int srcWidth,
                      int srcHeight,
                      int dstWidth,
                      int dstHeight,
                      ScalingUtilities.ScalingLogic scalingLogic)
        Calculate optimal down-sampling factor given the dimensions of a source image, the dimensions of a destination area and a scaling logic.
        Parameters:
        srcWidth - Width of source image
        srcHeight - Height of source image
        dstWidth - Width of destination area
        dstHeight - Height of destination area
        scalingLogic - Logic to use to avoid image stretching
        Returns:
        Optimal down scaling sample size for decoding

      • calculateSrcRect

        public static android.graphics.Rect calculateSrcRect(int srcWidth,
                                     int srcHeight,
                                     int dstWidth,
                                     int dstHeight,
                                     ScalingUtilities.ScalingLogic scalingLogic)
        Calculates source rectangle for scaling bitmap
        Parameters:
        srcWidth - Width of source image
        srcHeight - Height of source image
        dstWidth - Width of destination area
        dstHeight - Height of destination area
        scalingLogic - Logic to use to avoid image stretching
        Returns:
        Optimal source rectangle
